## Description {#details}

Describes an element of a <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfield">Bitfield</a>.

This type is then used with the <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfield">Bitfield</a> static member functions. 
<ParametersList title="Template Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="T">The type of the field once in unpacked form.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Offset">The position of the first bit.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Size">The size of the field.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="MaxValue">For enums the maximum enum allowed.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

Definition at line 223 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/bitfields-h">Bitfields.h</a>.
